com.utilis.game.obj
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  com.utilis.game.obj.Collider
      com.utilis.game.obj.Entity

public class Entity
extends Collider

Class representing an object that is not locked to a grid and can collide with other Colliders

Author:
Cin316
See Also:
Collider, Canvas
